fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Kill everything at once. This is usable at night and at day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Killing everything will also kill you. Your attack ignores defense of any kind. You cannot be killed, and you cannot be controlled into using your ability, but you can be roleblocked.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Avoid the temptation of automatically ending the game by using your ability.
